name: category: accessibility
description: The issue/PR is related to accessibility.

name: category: backend
description: The issue/PR is related to the backend (i.e. WordPress Dashboard).

name: category: compatibility
description: The issue/PR is related to compatibility.

name: category: dependencies
description: The issue/PR is related to dependencies.

name: category: i18n
description: The issue/PR is related to internationalization.

name: category: performance
description: The issue/PR is related to performance.

name: category: refactor
description: The issue/PR is related to refactoring.

name: category: won't fix
description: The issue won’t be fixed.

name: good first issue
description: The issue is a good candidate for the first community contribution/for a newcomer to the team.

name: focus: accessibility
description: This issue/PR is specifically focused to accessibility.

name: focus: action scheduler
description: Issues related to action scheduler.

name: focus: performance
description: This issue/PR is related to performance.

name: needs: author feedback
description: The issue/PR needs a response from any of the parties involved in the issue.

name: needs: cleanup
description: The issue/PR is related to needing a code cleanup.

name: needs: discussion
description: Issue that either needs discussion or pending decision (not for support requests).

name: needs: documentation
description: The issue/PR requires documentation to be added.

name: needs: developer feedback
description: Issues that need feedback from one of the CoCart Core developers.

name: needs: help
description: Issues that need help from either another CoCart Core developer or community contributor.

name: needs: tests
description: The issue/PR needs tests before it can move forward.

name: PHP: 7.4
description: Issues related to PHP 7.4 only.

name: PHP: 8.0
description: Issues related to PHP 8.0 only.

name: PHP: 8.1
description: Issues related to PHP 8.1 only.

name: PHP: 8.2
description: Issues related to PHP 8.2 only.

name: PHP: 8.3
description: Issues related to PHP 8.3 only.

name: PHP: 8.4
description: Issues related to PHP 8.4 only.

name: pr: major
description: Add to a PR to trigger a MAJOR version bump when merged.

name: pr: minor
description: Add to a PR to trigger a MINOR version bump when merged.

name: pr: patch
description: Add to a PR to trigger a PATCH version bump when merged.

name: priority: critical
description: The issue is critical—e.g. a fatal error, security problem affecting many customers.

name: priority: high
description: The issue/PR is high priority—it affects lots of customers substantially, but not critically.

name: priority: low
description: The issue/PR is low priority—not many people are affected or there’s a workaround, etc.

name: release: add changelog
description: Mark all PRs that have not had their changelog entries added.

name: release: cherry-pick
description: Commits from this PR also needs to be added to current release branch.

name: release: highlight
description: Issues that have a high user impact and need to be discussed/paid attention to.

name: status: awaiting triage
description: This is a newly created issue waiting for triage.

name: status: blocked
description: The issue is blocked from progressing, waiting for another piece of work to be done.

name: status: can't reproduce
description: Issues that can't be reproduced.

name: status: developer reproduction
description: Bug reports that need to be reproduced and confirmed by a developer.

name: status: in progress
description: This is being worked on.

name: status: needs review
description: PR needs reviewing

name: status: on hold
description: The issue is currently not prioritized.

name: status: stale
description: Issues that have not had any activity for some time.

name: status: won't fix
description: The issue won’t be fixed.

name: type: bug
description: The issue is a confirmed bug.

name: type: community contribution
description: The issue/PR is community contribution.

name: type: documentation
description: This issue is a request for better documentation.

name: type: duplicate
description: The issue/PR is a duplicate of another issue.

name: type: enhancement
description: The issue is a request for an enhancement.

name: type: question
description: The issue is a question about how code works.

name: type: regression
description: Issues that have been introduced by a code change that impacted existing functionality.

name: type: support request
description: Issues marked as a support request. These issues are closed automatically once tagged.
